subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: Reigning superstars claim much of the attention at the N.B.A. finals, but also fascinating are the veteran role players with an opportunity to win the prize that eluded some of the very best.
snippet: Reigning superstars claim much of the attention at the N.B.A. finals, but also fascinating are the veteran role players with an opportunity to win the prize that eluded some of the very best.
